plot: Jaime Ortiz is 40 years old. He lives with his mother and doesn't have a job because he was born with an unusual disease for which he has to take extreme measures of care. Together they set out to find a cure as absurd as the disease.
title: Jaime Tapones
plot_es: Jaime Ortiz is 40 years old. He lives with his mother and doesn't have a job because he was born with an unusual disease for which he has to take extreme measures of care. Together they set out to find a cure as absurd as the disease.
